flawed_nl_solution:
Mara has 40 x (10 / 100) = <<40*(10/100)=4>>4 pink crayons.
Luna has 50 x (20 / 100) = <<50*(20/100)=10>>10 pink crayons.
Together they have 4 + 10 = <<4+10=41>>41 pink crayons
#### 41

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 41. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
